
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
# define sz(a) int((a).size())
# define all(c) (c).begin(),(c).end() 
# define allr(c) (c).rbegin(),(c).rend() 

using namespace std;

vector<int> primes(1000005, 1);

int main() {
    primes[0] = primes[1] = 0;
    for (int i = 2; i <= 1000; ++i) {
        if (primes[i]) {
            for (int j = i * i; j <= 1000000; j += i) primes[j] = 0;
        }
    }

    for (int i = 2; i <= 1000000; ++i) {
        primes[i] += primes[i - 1];
    }
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while (t--) {
        int a, b;
        cin >> a >> b;
        cout << primes[b] - primes[a - 1] << '\n';
    }
}
